attributes.review:
As an open minded member of gen z, I downloaded this app to keep up with the President and make informed decisions about this election in November. This, however, is the worst app Iâ€™ve ever looked at. Upon opening it, one would think to see patriotic imagery and a brave world leader. Instead, my eyes were assaulted with a moldy Twinkie of a man who looks like heâ€™d be scared by his own shadow. The traitor was a complete disgrace to the American flag he stood so proudly in front of. This pathetic image made me throw up profusely all over my new iPhone 13. The sheer force of the vomit broke the screen and circuits of the phone; I had to buy a completely new phone. Do not get this app unless you are blind, and I would still be careful even if you were. The audio description might even accurately portray the image of this excuse of a human. Biden 2020 

Thank you
